title: Seared Scallops with Warm Pineapple Salsa

instructions.1: Combine pineapple, bell pepper, cilantro, green onions, and lime juice in medium bowl; set aside.
instructions.2: In another bowl, coat scallops with oil, and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
instructions.3: Heat a heavy non-stick skillet over high heat until very hot. Add scallops to the hot skillet; cook, turning once, until scallops are well seared on both sides and cooked through, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer scallops to a plate; set aside.
instructions.4: Pour salsa into the hot skillet; cook until heated through, about 1 minute. Serve scallops with warm salsa alongside.

questions.question: In Step 4, is the scallops from Step 2 being used?
Is scallops from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is skillet from Step 3 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is green onions from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 3, is it still valid to use the skillet in Step 4?
Can we coat (Step 2) and heat (Step 3) at the same time?
